sentences.en: Actually I prefer canned cranberry sauce.
sentences.cn: 事实上我更喜欢罐装的蔓越橘酱.

sentences.en: And a good cranberry sauce is a must!
And many other delicious foods! Pumpkin pies, nuts, cranberry sauce and corn.
sentences.cn: 还有很多别的美味食物 —— 南瓜派 、 坚果 、 红莓酱和玉米.

sentences.en: And then the young woman said, " Mr. Cranberry will see you now. "
sentences.cn: 后来,那个年轻的女子说: “ 克雷伯里先生现在要见你. ”

sentences.en: Goji berries are chewy and taste like a cross between a cranberry and a cherry.
sentences.cn: 枸杞耐嚼,味道介于越桔和樱桃之间.

sentences.en: High - acid cranberry juice controls harmful bacteria.
sentences.cn: 含酸度高的酸莓汁可控制体内有害细菌的滋长.

sentences.en: It does its job with subtlety, however, spurning the hammer intensity of something like cranberry juice.
sentences.cn: 然而, 它与微妙做它的工作践踏象酸果蔓的果实果汁一样的一些东西的榔头紧张.

sentences.en: Of course, sweetie. We'll need them for cranberry dish.
sentences.cn: 当然, 宝贝儿. 吃越橘子我们要用它们.

sentences.en: Other high - ranking products include cloudy apple juice and cranberry juice drink.
sentences.cn: 其他含量较高的包括苹果汁和蔓越橘汁.

sentences.en: Palate is very soft with dark cherry, cranberry, and currant fruits.
sentences.cn: 味道是黑樱桃, 小红莓, 醋栗和水果.

sentences.en: Some good things you should try though are cranberry juice, wild rice and yoghurt.
sentences.cn: 一些你应该吃的健康食物包括酸果蔓汁, 菰米和酸奶.

sentences.en: There will be plum pudding, mince pie, other varieties of food and cranberry juice and squash.
sentences.cn: 另外还备有葡萄干布丁 、 肉馅饼 、 各种其它食物以及红莓苔汁和鲜果汁.

sentences.en: They usually have 3 - 4 kinds available such as chocolate chip, blueberry and cranberry.
sentences.cn: 他们通常可提供 3-4 种烤饼,例如巧克力薄片 、 蓝莓和草莓的.

sentences.en: Trinny: It's made with peach 2 schnapps, vodka, and orange and cranberry juice.
sentences.cn: 崔妮: 这是用水蜜桃杜松子酒 、 伏特加, 以及柳橙和小红莓汁调成.

sentences.en: Turkey reminds me of cranberry sauce.
sentences.cn: 火鸡让我想起蔓越橘酱.

phrases.tran_cn: 酸果曼沙司；小红莓果酱
